title: When is it safe to ease lockdowns?
text: When is it safe to ease lockdowns?
Contact tracing and a low number of new cases are crucial before lifting coronavirus restrictions, reports Jessica Hamzelou.
abstract: Contact tracing and a low number of new cases are crucial before lifting coronavirus restrictions, reports Jessica Hamzelou.

similar.title: Coronavirus spreads.
text: The deadly virus that emerged in Wuhan, China, may be much more contagious than initially thought. Jessica Hamzelou reports.
abstract: The deadly virus that emerged in Wuhan, China, may be much more contagious than initially thought. Jessica Hamzelou reports.
